meanings.definition: The way a food or drink feels in the mouth.
meanings.sent1: The ice cream's mouthfeels were creamy and smooth.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the mouthfeels of crunchy chips.
meanings.sent3: The mouthfeels of the fizzy drink tickled my tongue.
meanings.sent4: The mouthfeels of the hot soup warmed me up on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The mouthfeels of the fresh fruit were juicy and refreshing.

meanings.definition: The sensation experienced in the mouth when consuming something.
meanings.sent1: The spicy mouthfeels lingered after eating the chili.
meanings.sent2: The sweet mouthfeels of the dessert made me smile.
meanings.sent3: The sour mouthfeels of the lemon made me pucker up.
meanings.sent4: The mouthfeels of the mint gum were cool and refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The mouthfeels of the hot tea soothed my sore throat.
